name: Dungeonfall (devantics, Vlad_7onoff, mevlme44, Diziger)
description:
Dungeonfall is a short physics-based arena slasher. You’ve got four minutes to get to the bottom while swinging an enormous sledgehammer around to crash several types of enemies.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys & mouse or Xbox Controller

Try downloadables if audio in the web version is glitchy or if it's too dark compared to screenshots.
